title: Tokyo Prism Chronicles Game Music Pack
description: This comprehensive package encompasses 17 music tracks, including three vocal songs and 14 instrumental tracks
longDescription:
A Royalty-free Music Collection for Modern Fantasy Works in Alternate Worlds.


Immerse yourself in the evocative soundscape of this music collection, portraying the thrilling fantasy adventures of young students amidst the ruins of Tokyo. The assortment comprises high-tempo, passionate fight music adorned with impressive synthesizer melodies. Additionally, it features emotionally resonant piano and strings tracks that impeccably capture the characters' sentiments, making them ideal for dungeon exploration scenes and intimate moments with classmates. Every composition is crafted to complement pivotal scenes within your narrative.


Notably, this project boasts a collaboration with Yuu Moroi, an accomplished vocalist renowned for contributions to major Japanese arcade games and TV commercials. Teaming up with "Jesus Gonzalvez," Moroi is credited with penning the lyrics for the three vocal songs featured in the album. These vocal compositions are designed to elevate the impact of the battle scenes in your game project.


Consider this asset your golden ticket to unlocking boundless creativity and taking your projects to unprecedented heights. Prepare to plunge into a realm of limitless possibilities and unearth the extraordinary with the top-tier offerings of Tokyo Prism Chronicles Game Music Pack!


This comprehensive package encompasses 17 music tracks, including three vocal songs and 14 instrumental tracks. All wav tracks are available in high-quality 16-bit format and have undergone meticulous remastering for optimal use in gaming environments. A condensed 60-second version and full loops and stingers of the original track are included to enhance usability.


YouTube: https://youtu.be/EQshur0MV5g?feature=shared


FULL Music + variations Preview

[Single Track Purchase + Download Available]: Website
